recipesJson.name: Absolute Custard
recipesJson.author: Kemmo
recipesJson.description: This is a super rich heavy custard with a subtle creme brulee note. Awesome winter vape. It doesn't have any pie crust notes that I'm not a fan of personally. The flavour doesn't fade over time and it steeps reasonably quickly for a custard/cream vape. Enjoy!

reviews.text: This is amazing stuff! I had been on a long search recently for a custard that didn't bore me, and this was perfect.
